title: Talk2 - Anonymous Chat
heroDesc: Chat freely without leaving a trace. Create a room, share messages and images, and everything auto-deletes after 24 hours. No sign-up required.
howDesc: Simple by design. Secure by default.
step1Desc: Enter any room name. If it doesn't exist, it's created instantly just for you.
step2Desc: No accounts. Just pick a temporary nickname and you're in. Be anyone.
step3Desc: Chat, share images. Every 24 hours, the room wipes itself clean.
fIdentDesc: We don't know who you are, and we don't want to. No email, no phone verification.
fAutoDesc: A cron job rigorously cleans the database and file system every hour for content older than 24h.
fRealDesc: Built on Socket.io for millisecond-latency messaging. Typing indicators included.
fMediaDesc: Drag and drop images. They are uploaded securely and deleted along with the messages.
fRespDesc: A dark-themed, glassmorphic interface that looks beautiful on any device.
fOpenDesc: The code is transparent. Verification is better than trust.
fSecureDesc: All data is transmitted via HTTPS/WSS standards to prevent interception.
fGlobalDesc: Optimized for low-latency connections worldwide using lightweight protocols.
fLightDesc: No bloated frameworks. Pure vanilla JS for maximum performance.
systemBanner: Data in this room is cleared every 24 hours.
confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear ONLY your messages?
confirmDelete: Do you want to delete this message?
expiryDesc: Choose how long messages last in this room.
expirySelected1h: Messages will be deleted in 1 hour.
expirySelectedHours: Messages will be deleted in {hours} hours.
expirySelected7d: Messages will be deleted in 7 days.
